name: Tanker_Melee.Super_Strength
display_help: Super Strength gives you combat powers derived from your super-human physical strength. Super Strength powers tend to knock foes back.

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Super_Strength.Jab
powers.display_help: A quick jab that deals minor damage, but has a chance of Disorienting the target, especially if coupled with other attacks. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 10.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 7.15s on target
10.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 2s on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Super_Strength.Punch
powers.display_help: Your Super Strength Punch can deal a moderate amount of damage, but most of all can knock your opponent off his feet, unable to attack again until he stands up. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 30.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
30.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Super_Strength.Haymaker
powers.display_help: A slow but devastating attack, the Haymaker has a great chance of knocking your opponent down. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 60.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
60.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Super_Strength.Taunt
powers.display_help: Taunts a foe, and some nearby foes, to attack you. Useful for pulling villains off an ally who find themselves in over their head. Taunted foes tend to ignore other Heroes and focus on you for quite a while, so use this power cautiously. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -100.00% strength to range for 20s on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Super_Strength.Hand_Clap
powers.display_help: You can clap your hands together with such force that you create a deafening shockwave. This shockwave can knock back nearby foes, and they have a chance to become Disoriented due to the shock to the inner ear. Hand Clap deals no damage. Note that Hand Clap is unaffected by Radius changes. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 50.00% chance for 1.0 stun for 9.54s on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Super_Strength.Knockout_Blow
powers.display_help: You can perform a Knockout Blow on your opponent. This punch does extreme damage, and has a great chance of Holding your target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Super_Strength.Rage
powers.display_help: A Rage comes over you, sending you into a berserker fury. While Raging, your damage and chance to hit is dramatically increased. However, when your Rage subsides, you are left with reduced Defense, drained of some of your Endurance, and your attacks are substantially weakened. Recharge: Long

display_info: 80.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 2m 0s on self
-9990.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self after 2m 0s delay
-20.00% strength to defense for 10s on self after 2m 0s delay

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Super_Strength.Hurl
powers.display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack deals high damage, and can knock foes back and even drop them out of the air if they are flying. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 50.00% chance for 7.8 magnitude knock on target
50.00% chance for 7.8 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Super_Strength.Foot_Stomp
powers.display_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can Stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range. Note that Foot Stomp is unaffected by Radius changes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 80.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
80.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
